ygData.subject: Gamma and music
ygData.msgSnippet: I dont know - maybe I m the only one to ever have this problem but I never knew until recently that there was a Gamma thingy that allows you to change your
ygData.messageBody:
I dont know - maybe I'm the only one to ever have
this problem but I never knew until recently that
there was a Gamma thingy that allows you to change your
brightness in game. I always thought that my Dark Elf should
be able to see alot better than my Erudite instead
of only alittle better. <br><br>I found out that my
Gamma setting was almost all the way to the bottom. Boy
what a difference it makes when you raise that up a
bit. <br><br>Also I played for almost a month before a
friend in the game enlightened me to the fact that there
is music. Like battle music and the music that comes
on when you come around certain things like the gate
at the Qeynos newbie area. My music thing was set
all the way down so I couldn't hear it.<br><br>Anyhow
I just thought that I would post about that here
because if anybody out there doesnt know about these
things then your missin out.<br><br>Hope this helps
someone and isnt just a waste of everyones
time.<br><br>Venture<br>21 necro<br>Saryrn
